introText:
Generations ago, a gate in the city of Hero opened to reveal a new world beyond. Scholars and traders emerged from the gate, bearing new sciences and magical artifacts.

A year later, the world behind the gate changed. Hoards of monsters poured out of the gate and ransacked the countryside. The wisemen from the gate were seen no more. In desperation, the gate was sealed and the town abandoned.

The legend of Hero was not forgotten. Dreaming of the world beyond the gate, many have sought the secret city of Hero, but none have returned. Now, another tale of adventure is about to begin...
raceText:
Humans carry 8 items and excel at single target weapon damage. They grow by drinking special potions.

Mutants carry 4 items and excel at group target magic. They naturally gain powers over time.

Monsters carry no items but are very versatile. They transform by eating stronger monsters.

Robots carry 8 items that recharge uses when the robot heals. They gain stats according to equipped items.
